dialog.line: Hi. Did you get a lift home with Rachel's mum today?

Sarah I thought I told you yesterday. You're supposed to get a lift with Rachel's mum, I'll have to phone her again and apologize. You couldn't have forgotten again. Anyway, where are you getting the money from to get the bus?
Mum. Me and Rachel aren't really friends anymore so I don't want to go home with her.
So has she been saying anything to you about, you know.... Why aren't you friends? Are you okay? Do you want to talk about it?
No. We've both just got new friends now that's all. Don't worry.
Okay. Go on up and do your homework. Tea will be ready in about an hour. And leave your PE kit down here so I can put it in the machine.
[Mum begins to put the PE kit in the washing machine when she finds a T-shirt that she knows isn't Sarah's.]
Sarah, Sarah, come here for a minute.
Oh, uhm, well. It's Justine's. I didn't have a T-Shirt for games so she let me borrow hers.
But Sarah yours is here in the bag.
Yeah I found it after. It must have dropped out of my bag in tutorial.
Okay. Well, I'll wash it then you can give it Justine tomorrow.
